author: Nick Nairn
method: Place the vegetables and stock into a saucepan and bring to the boil. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until all of the vegetables are tender. To serve, ladle the broth into two soup bowls and sprinkle over the chives.
ingredients: ½ onion, roughly chopped,  2 carrots, roughly chopped,  ¼ potato, peeled and roughly chopped,  300ml/½ pint chicken or vegetable stock,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  2 tbsp chopped fresh chives, to serve
